title: Kiernan Shipka, Shameik Moore Star in Let It Snow Trailer
text:
Netflix knows you want that easily digestible holiday content, so now, for your consideration, we present the trailer for Let It Snow. Based on the YA book Let It Snow: Three Holiday Romances, by Maureen Johnson, John Green, and Lauren Myracle, this Christmas gift is about three tales of romance that all intersect with one another. (You know, the old Love, Actually gambit.) Mitchell Hope wants Kiernan Shipka, Shameik Moore wants Isabela Moner, Liv Hewson wants Anna Akana, and Jacob Batalon seems to want everyone to be happy and have a good time. It’s friends. It’s love. It’s Christmas. Let It Snow starts streaming November 8.

Related
description: Kiernan Shipka, Isabela Moner, Jacob Batalon, and Shameik Moore star in the trailer for Netflix’s Let It Snow.
